text: Samuel (Sam) McBratney (1 March 1943 â€“ 18 September 2020)Something About The Author, vol. 164, ed. Lisa Kumar, Cengage Gale, 2006, p. 150 was a Northern Irish writer. He wrote more than fifty books for children and young adults. He was best known as the author of the best-selling children's book Guess How Much I Love You. He was born in Belfast, Northern Ireland. McBratney died on 18 September 2020 in County Antrim, Northern Ireland at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Children's writers Category:Writers from Belfast
